channel.title: Financial Technology on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Technology on FinanClub

item.title: PYPL
item.description: score:158 Chances: PayPal Holdings, Inc. recently announced the appointment of Carmine Di Sibio, outgoing Global Chairman and CEO of EY, to its Board as an independent director. Follow-on buy points are important areas to add shares or make new stock purchases, and PayPal stock has made two good ones during its run.

item.title: FIS
item.description: score:299 Chances: Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (FIS) shareholders should be happy to see the share price up 17%. The latest trading day saw Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) settling at $62.96, representing a -1.08% change from its previous close. FIS and Banked have formed a partnership to create new pay-by-bank solutions by leveraging the power of open banking, APIs and real-time payments.
